(I still have a few e-mails to catch up on, so if I miss something, I 
apologize in advance^_^ I don't have much typing time either! Oh, I'm glad 
your surgery went well Teltoli! And there is absolutely nothing wrong with 
resembling the mighty onion^_^)

Rion/Hysteria/Tavatron

Rion:

Rion nodded as Dian trotted out toward some direction. He was bad with 
directions, but maybe this would be a good time to practice:

"Allright! Let's go!"

Rion ran head first down the sand dune he happened to be standing on, 
eventually tumbling down it and landing with a face full of sand.

*****

Hysteria:

The shields, unable to maintain the break for even ten seconds, finally 
fluctuated and died out. She opened a comm to IR:

"Commander, the shields are off line, I'm sorry, but there's nothing more I 
can do except disengage the lockdown on your command."

*****

Tavatron watched as the 'bots exited the base. Everything seemed to be 
toning down. The tension had lessend by a noticible degree... and something 
small and fuzzy was flying toward Dinobot's head. Tavatron rubbed her 
optics. She had to be seeing things. The stress of battle and lack thereof 
was wearing on her. She desperetly needed sleep. Her fur was cacked with 
dired mud and fluid, that of her enemies and her own. However, too much of 
it WAS her own, and that posed a problem. All the while she continued 
rubbing her eyes, convinced there was nothing small, fuzzy, and winged 
flying toward Dinobot's head. At least, she hoped so.
